screen.name: MessageBox
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code,but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize,ePoint
orgwidth=self.instance.size().width() orgpos=self.instance.position() textsize=self["text" ].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize=(textsize[0 ] + 60,textsize[1 ] + 80) offset=60 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset=90 wsizex=textsize[0 ] + 120 wsizey=textsize[1 ] + offset if (600 > wsizex): wsizex=600 wsize=(wsizex,wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text" ].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize=(wsizex - 20,80) self["list" ].instance.move(ePoint(10,textsize[1 ])) self["list" ].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth=wsize[0 ] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2,orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxExt
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 80, textsize[1] + 80) offset = 80 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 140 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 30, 150) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))

screen.name: MessageBoxSimple
screen.title: Message
screen.applet:
# this should be factored out into some helper code, but currently demonstrates applets. from enigma import eSize, ePoint orgwidth = self.instance.size().width() orgpos = self.instance.position() textsize = self["text"].getSize()
# y size still must be fixed in font stuff... textsize = (textsize[0] + 100, textsize[1] + 100) offset = 100 if self.type == self.TYPE_YESNO: offset = 180 wsizex = textsize[0] + 100 wsizey = textsize[1] + offset if (800 > wsizex): wsizex = 800 wsize = (wsizex, wsizey)
# resize self.instance.resize(eSize(*wsize))
# resize label self["text"].instance.resize(eSize(*textsize))
# move list listsize = (wsizex - 50, 180) self["list"].instance.move(ePoint(10, textsize[1])) self["list"].instance.resize(eSize(*listsize))
# center window newwidth = wsize[0] self.instance.move(ePoint(orgpos.x() + (orgwidth - newwidth)/2, orgpos.y()))
